long_description: The Osprey Poco sunshade deploys quickly, making it easy to shield your little one from the sun's hot rays while riding in the Poco child carrier (sold separately). Simply remove the Poco sunshade from its pocket and clip in place with the 2 buckles located on the panel behind the main harness.
short_description: The Osprey Poco sunshade deploys quickly, making it easy to shield your little one from the sun's hot rays while riding in the Poco child carrier (sold separately).
